column2:
RT <- full_join (kbh_data_clean, RT) %>%
  filter(initial_trial=="distractor_initial") %>%
  filter(noun_onset >= 360 & noun_onset <= 1800)%>%
mutate(first_true = ifelse(target == TRUE & lag(target) == FALSE, 1, 0))
